channel.title: No monsters?
channel.description:
Whne i started on moparscape i walked around and there arent any monsters.... when i summon one i only hit 0's on it and they die really weird
how do i make my moparscape just like runescape but offline and still customizable
Sorry for being a noob...I'm trying =P
Thanks =]

item.title: No monsters?
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

first of all retaing yourself from cusing please. Second the reason there isnt any monsters is because your using hybridscape not a source. A way to get a source is to go to downloads and find one. I recomedn pvpscape or phonescape. Now the way to fix hp this is to go into npc and find w/e monster your want hps raised and change the second #. So if it was say a guard it should look like this

npc = 10	Guard				22	22

hope that helps

Read full topic
